thread.title: Harry Oestreich
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Deutschland bewertet von Harry Oestreich

author: Harry Oestreich
title: Harry Oestreich
text: The process of selecting and ordering a floral arrangement to be delivered to someone in another country on the other side of the world was so easy and quick. I'm just sorry to say I was not able to see the actual arrangement ordered but understand that it might be slightly different from what I selected, due to changes in seasonal flowers. I did not feel it appropriate to have the recipient send me a picture of it, so I am left not knowing what it actually looked like and whether or not it was worth the money. It would be helpful for the florist to send a picture of the arrangement via email to anyone ordering from out of country.
